dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:21,500. Oriented with north toward the left. Appears in: General atlas. London: published under the superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge [by] George Cox, [1853]. Views below map: Writers buildings -- Government house -- Esplanade Row. Includes list of references to public buildings, churches and chapels. 170|24 x 41 centimeters, on sheet 37 x 43 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:21,500|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
